Title: Night Has a Thousand Eyes
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Ashley Lyle, Bart Nickerson, L.J. Smith (character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries"), Marguerite MacIntyre (story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (executive story editor)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: While searching for a way to vanquish Dahlia, Klaus is faced with another threat.
